short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: unilink.me is a service that provides links to all of your university web pages in one easy to remember location.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
unilink.me is a service that provides links to all of your university web pages in one easy to remember location. Do not feel lost online at university.

Features:
- Search for your University
- Remembers your last selected University
- Displays all the links for your selected University
- Is always up to date, any link on the unilink.me website is the same as the links in the plugin
